title: Hibiscus and kombucha sparkling mocktail
description: Stir up a refreshing kombucha mocktail with our easy recipe. This sparkling concoction has a gorgeous pink hue, thanks to the hibiscus.
ingredients: 3 tbsp simple syrup (buy Monin or see Know-how)
2 tbsp hibiscus powder (from Waitrose or Amazon â€“ or buy dried hibiscus from a health food shop and grind it)
Juice 3 limes, plus slices to garnish
Juice 2 ruby grapefruit, plus thin wedges to garnish
2 x 275ml bottles kombucha, tonic or non-alcoholic fizz

method.Step 1: Combine the syrup, hibiscus powder, lime and grapefruit juice in a jug. Pour into tumblers over ice, then top up with kombucha (or other fizz) and serve.
